keyword: how many calories in a honey bun
title: How Many Calories in a Honey Bun?
meta_description: Discover how many calories in a honey bun, including carbs, fats, protein, and full nutrition breakdown with tweaks and FAQs for better choices.
h1: How Many Calories in a Honey Bun?
assumptions: Standard commercial honey bun (approx. 100 g), yeast dough with honey glaze, no fillings; values based on average packaged product.
disclaimer: Nutrition varies by brand, size, recipe, and baking method. Check labels when available.

quick_answer.text: A typical honey bun contains about 420 kcal, mostly from carbs and fats.

label_note: Totals mirror Nutrition Facts labels for easy comparison.

faqs.q: How many calories in a honey bun?
faqs.a: Approximately 420 kcal for a standard 100 g commercial honey bun.

faqs.q: What are the carbs in a honey bun?
faqs.a: About 52 g total carbs, including 28 g sugars and 1 g fiber.

faqs.q: Is a honey bun high in fat?
faqs.a: Yes, around 20 g fat per bun, with 8 g saturated fat.

faqs.q: How much protein in a honey bun?
faqs.a: Roughly 5 g protein, making it low in this nutrient.

faqs.q: Do honey buns vary by brand?
faqs.a: Yes, calories can range from 350-500 kcal depending on size and ingredients; always check the label.
